Class Robot.RobotLED

java.lang.Object
  se.nicklasgavelin.sphero.Robot.RobotLED
Enclosing class:
Robot
public class Robot.RobotLED
extends java.lang.Object

Manages the RGB and LED brightness information to prevent storing this directly in objects in the Robot instance.

Author:
Nicklas Gavelin
